scripts.dev:all: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env --profile app --profile monitoring up -d
scripts.stop:app: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env stop portal strapi
scripts.reset:db: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env down && docker volume rm archpad_pgdata || true && docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env up -d
scripts.reset:all: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env down -v && docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env up -d
